html:
10.11.20  4:18 pm   what is your favorite tree?

      every tree is actually a part of the same tree, which is my favorite

10.11.20  3:05 pm   Is gravity real?

      sort of

10.11.20  2:00 pm   What inspired you to make music?

      must have been music itself

10.11.20  1:51 pm   How do I learn how to drive?

      very carefully

10.11.20  12:34 pm   Have you ever done one of those quizzes that give you a 4-letter personality type?

     yes

     I would guess that you'd get IN something P but perhaps I'm just insane

     the thing about the results, i've discovered it's different depending on how you answer the questions

10.11.20  11:24 am   Are you going to make more videos?

      flipping hecko yes/yeah

10.11.20  10:04 am   Is your new song gonna be completed by 2020, do you think  you can complete it by the end of 2020 atleast?

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

10.11.20  9:55 am   why is the wifi symbol 3 curves and a dot, i need to know

      the 3 lines represent the internet, radiating out through society from its origin point (represented by a dot) which i believe represents the earth's core

10.11.20  8:21 am   have you ever said "i was going to say yes but now that i think about it no"

      yes

10.11.20  7:17 am   Are you planning on making video's in the future?

      oh hell yeah

10.11.20  6:31 am   what is your opinion on bread

      it's like a bed you can eat

10.11.20  5:43 am   Here's a moment from one of your improv videos that i think about a lot: you're singing "bruce hornsby had a..." **PAINED LOOK COMES OVER YOUR FACE BUT YOU KEEP GOING** "lamb and he lambed it"
so now, frequently, when i'm confronted with something really hard that i may fail at but will be stronger for trying, i think ofbruce hornsby lambing the lamb. i hope that comes off as the compliment it's intended to be

      the thing about lambing a lamb is, it's effortless. each and every lamb had already been lambed, initially, as a default state. but it can be so hard to remember this, in the heat of the moment

10.11.20  4:30 am   Have you chosen one of the two song titles yet?

      no. will not be sure until the last minute

10.11.20  3:52 am   somewhat legit question, but what genre would you consider your music,

     normal

     or do you think that one single genre wouldn't work with your music?

      it's like a bowl of liquid. how many liquids are in the bowl? if you counted correctly, then it's not liquid

10.11.20  2:54 am   do you like bagels?

      almost

10.11.20  1:58 am   what do you think of corn

      it's like a lego set that you can only take apart

10.11.20  12:40 am   when you asked the question "what if Spain was in Greece" did you mean the geography of Spain in Greece or the cultures and people in Spain in Greece? or was it both

      i actually just needed 2 locations that were 1 syllable, and apparently there's actually not that many choices, and i tried maybe about 10 other combinations that all sounded horrible, but spain/greece sounded great

10.10.20  11:31 pm   Whats your opinion on Scotland?

      if you'd never been to Greenland, you would think there was no greener a land than Scotland

10.10.20  10:22 pm   have you ever made a typo?

      yes, but really i'm just selecting typos from nature that already existed

10.10.20  9:56 pm   what are your thoughts on mustard 

      i guess i will admit there is a small chance it might be real

10.10.20  8:49 pm   hi bill I have hundreds or possibly thousands of small musical ideas (riffs, chord progressions, melodies e.c.t) that I have been making/recording since around 2014 and I want to start turning them into fully formed songs. Any advice on how to achieve this? Thanks 

      first, number the list. then go to random dot org, and get a selection based on that number range. this will pick the next item to work on. Now, to work on the item, first, just retrieve the documentation. listen to it / read it, briefly familiarize yourself with it. The next big question to ask is, does this item belong at the beginning of the song, or not. The next steps differ depending on what the answer to that is, and i will explain more in the next episode

10.10.20  7:46 pm   How do you keep your glasses from smudging up when you wipe them down 

      wipe them up, perhaps they will smudge down

10.10.20  6:43 pm   How do I get my parents to love me?

      you could try adopting them

10.10.20  5:30 pm   you are very good about making your music actually go somewhere while also not making it seem like a bunch of songs strapped together

      strap the songs to other things, that's what i say

10.10.20  4:51 pm   Do you think technology is a bad thing for mental health?

      no

10.10.20  4:32 pm   Are you workig on something big right now?

      i'm working on my abilities to make things, but trying to also rush to do something of average size, followed by several other things of average size

10.10.20  3:34 pm   what is your opinion on pRiNgLeS

      i'm pretty sure that's a 3D graph of a 3 variable math function

10.10.20  3:23 pm   Whats your opinion on banana flavored donuts?

      how can you be sure it's not a donut flavored banana

10.10.20  2:30 pm   What's your opinion on snakes?

      can't tell where one snake ends and the next one begins

10.10.20  1:54 pm   Have you done any covers of songs yet?

     barely

      If not, what seems like it'd be fun to cover?

     i started making a list which quickly surpassed 900

     (If you haven't done a cover because you'd rather do your own thing that's cool and I respect that and hope above all things you're having fun and taking care of yourself)

10.10.20  1:19 pm   Are you working on one or several videos ?

      1 at a time

10.10.20  12:57 pm   have you considered publishing the mp3 for your new song on the songs page before the video is finished,

     no

      so then the people who don't care for the videos and just listen to the music don't have to wait to hear the song? or is it important that they go together

     they don't have to go together, but i would prefer if they are released at the same time. sometimes they are released separately by mistake, or if i actually didn't think there was going to be a video at all, at the time of release

10.10.20  12:19 pm   what do you think of learning latin

      that would be cool but i would rather learn chinese

10.10.20  11:34 am   when will u release anew song

      hopefully every tuesday, if i am who i hecking say i am

10.10.20  10:59 am   When are you making a video

      now

10.10.20  10:57 am   where's earth

      got to be somewhere around here

10.10.20  10:22 am   could you upload a sneak peek (or somwthing like that) of your next vid

      yes

10.10.20  10:12 am   what would you call a chord with notes Eb Bb G C?

     if the bass is on Eb: then i would call the chord Eb6
     if the bass is on F: then i would call the chord F9sus4
     if the bass is on G: then i would call the chord Cmin7/G
     if the bass is on Ab: then i would call the chord Abmaj9
     if the bass is on Bb: then i would call the chord Cmin7/Bb
     if the bass is on C: then i would call the chord Cmin7
     it's that simple

10.10.20  9:52 am   Does you make new video yes?????

      yes but that's not as important as all the videos i will make after that

10.10.20  8:34 am   Do you know when the new video is coming out i know it takes time it's just I need to know

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

10.10.20  7:26 am   whaddaya think of the philippines

      they have a lot of cities

10.10.20  6:55 am   What is your opinion on steel ?

      the ultimate tool, of gentleness

10.10.20  6:24 am   I dare you to make an I-V-vi-IV song and see what happens

      took me a minute to translate the roman but yes i've done that

10.10.20  5:00 am   why are you so damn good at music

      could be some type of childhood defense mechanism

10.10.20  4:40 am   what do you think about trees

      i like the idea

10.10.20  4:11 am   bill will you ever make a dance video

      i was under the impression that if a video has dance in it, it is a dance video

10.10.20  3:09 am   have you considered being a opossum?

      no

10.10.20  3:09 am   When is your next vid coming out (its ok if your worng)

     i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

     Also can i make a religion out of you

10.10.20  2:46 am   Have you mastered the language of love yet?

      no

10.10.20  1:14 am   how to create energy from nothing

      ask yourself how you like the nothing
